review: A few issues.  Firstly, this item is not wireless as I originally believed.  I made the incorrect assumption that the USB cord was for charging only, when it in fact must always be plugged in.  The interface itself is fine and is does all the things a normal smart TV does but in a delayed manner.  When scrolling through titles it often freezes for a moment and then scrolls feverishly though titles and a blinding speed  This becomes tiresome.  Lastly and in conclusion, I just don't think its worth the money (even at this reduced price compared to the set-top amazon fire box).
